place.name: UPTON NOBLE
place.gazetteerText: UPTON-NOBLE, a parish in Shepton-Mallet district, Somerset; 1¾ mile SW of Witham r. station, and 3½ NNE of Bruton. Post town, Bruton, under Bath. Acres, 677. Real property, £1,170. Pop., 217. Houses, 54. The property is subdivided. The living is a p. curacy, annexed to Batcombe. The church is ancient Charities, £8. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
